title: Symbolic Manipulations - Exp/Log/Trig Functions Part A

content.question: Part A The functions <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>g</mi> </math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>h</mi> </math> are given by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>g</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mn>3</mn> <mi>ln</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mi>x</mi> <mo>−</mo> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> <mi>ln</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@482E@</annotation> </semantics> </math> <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>h</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mi>sin</mi> </mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mtext> </mtext><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>cos</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>x</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4990@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. (i) Rewrite <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>g</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadEgacaaMi8UaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaaaaa@3B1B@</annotation> </semantics> </math> as a single natural logarithm without negative exponents in any part of the expression. Your result should be of the form <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>ln</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mtext>expression</mtext> </mrow> <mo>)</mo></mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4324@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. (ii) Rewrite <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>h</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadIgacaaMi8UaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaaaaa@3B1C@</annotation> </semantics> </math> as an expression in which <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>cos</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiGacogacaGGVbGaai4CaiaaysW7caWG4baaaa@3BA6@</annotation> </semantics> </math> appears once and no other trigonometric functions are involved.

frqParts.text: Part A The functions <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>g</mi> </math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>h</mi> </math> are given by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>g</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mn>3</mn> <mi>ln</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mi>x</mi> <mo>−</mo> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> <mi>ln</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@482E@</annotation> </semantics> </math> <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>h</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mi>sin</mi> </mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mtext> </mtext><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>cos</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>x</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4990@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. (i) Rewrite <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>g</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadEgacaaMi8UaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaaaaa@3B1B@</annotation> </semantics> </math> as a single natural logarithm without negative exponents in any part of the expression. Your result should be of the form <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>ln</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mtext>expression</mtext> </mrow> <mo>)</mo></mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4324@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. (ii) Rewrite <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>h</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadIgacaaMi8UaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaaaaa@3B1C@</annotation> </semantics> </math> as an expression in which <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>cos</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiGacogacaGGVbGaai4CaiaaysW7caWG4baaaa@3BA6@</annotation> </semantics> </math> appears once and no other trigonometric functions are involved.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
